description: Translate only rows where line_7b_disturbance_history is not NULL
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Gets disturbance type from source string using substring of the first character, then maps value to DIST_TYPE_1 using lists of values

Takes substring of second and third characters from source attribute, checks they are null, integers and between 0-99, then translates the substring to a year by concatenating with 19 or 20 depending on the cutoff. Cutoff for BC08 is 17, for BC10 is 18. e.g. L20 would become 1920 and L02 would become 2002.
